alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 8:30PM EDT until March 14 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sussex. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain or a mix of rain and snow will change to snow later tonight. Periods of heavy snow is possible late tonight and Tuesday. The greatest snow totals will be in the higher elevations mainly above 1000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
